description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. 3D Survival - They say I's crazy, but this shotgun ain't crazy!  There's demons everywhere, and I know what to do to demons.  Point my boom stick at em and exorcise their face off!  -- Kill waves of demons using a variety of weapons and abilities in this 3D overhead action game.
description.short: 3D Survival - They say I's crazy, but this shotgun ain't crazy!  There's demons everywhere, and I know what to do to demons.  Point my boom stick at em and exorcise their face off!  -- Kill waves of demons using a variety of weapons and abilities in this 3D overhead action game.
